response:
MRI is the gold standard to visualise the suspected demyelinating lesions and confirm dissemination in space. Serological testing for AQP4 and MOG antibodies is essential to differentiate MS from NMOSD/MOGAD, as this alters long-term management. Lumbar puncture is indicated to support an inflammatory diagnosis (oligoclonal bands). Basic bloods and vasculitis screens are required to rule out mimics and metabolic contributors.
